AI Description: Intel CUDA is a software development kit for accelerating applications using GPUs, particularly NVIDIA GPUs, by utilizing parallel computing features.
Core Features: 1. GPU acceleration for computationally intensive applications. 2. Utilizes parallel processing for increased performance. 3. Supports NVIDIA GPUs for high-speed computing tasks. 4. Integration with popular programming languages like C, C++, and Fortran.
General Tags: Gpu Acceleration, Parallel Computing, High-Performance Computing, Programming Languages
